OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CHRISTIAN CONSTITUENCY MOVEMENT - HALLAM BRANCH

Desc.entry: An ecumenical grouping of most of the churches in Sheffield Hallam parliamentary constituency. Has regular meetings to discuss social, moral, ethical, political and religious issues. Liaises regularly with church leaders, politicians, councillors and MPs at local, regional and national levels, and calls for responses and action on the issues raised.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: One Mon in the month at 7.30pm
